Ernesto Djédjé (1948-1983) bụ onye egwu Ivory Coast si Daloa
Nne na nna ya bụ Wolof na Bété
Djédjé malitere ịkpọ egwu n'afọ iri na ise mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-egwu guitarist na Ivoiro Star, otu onye na-eme egwuregwu dopé, na 1962
Ọ kwagara Paris na 1968 wee ghọọ nwa akwụkwọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe wee mee ndekọ mbụ ya na Anoma Brou Felix na 1970 site n'enyemaka nke Manu Dibango.
N'afọ 1972, ọ laghachiri n'ala nna ya iduzi San Pedro Orchestra
O mechara guzobe otu egwu a na-akpọ Les Ziglibithiens ma malite ụdị egwu a na'akpọ Ziglibithy dabere na ụdị egwu mgbọrọgwụ Bété jikọtara ya na rhythms Congolese
Ziglibithy nke Djedje bụ egwu egwu na-agba egwú nke ukwuu, nke a na-eji mpi abụba eme ihe na-agbagwoju anya.
Djedje dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya n'onwe ya na 1977, na-akpọ ya Ziboté na onye na-emepụta Gbadamassi Raïmi
E wepụtara abọm ọzọ, Le Roi du Ziglibithy, na Badmos Records na afọ 1977
O weputara abọm akpọrọ Aguisse (nakwa na Badmos Records), Tizere na Zouzoup Ale
All ndị a vinyl LP's are rare taa, ọ bụ ezie na Le Roi du Ziglibithy, nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ Djedje kacha mma ndekọ, e wepụtara ya na CD site na Popular African Music, nke nwere isi na Germany.
Onye isi ala Ivoirian Félix Houphouët-Boigny sọpụrụ ya maka onyinye ya na ọdịbendị mba na afo 1982
Djédjé nwụrụ na mberede n'ihi ọnyá a na-agwọghị agwọ na afọ 1983 mgbe ọ dị afọ 35, ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị na-ekwu na o nwere nsí.
